## ğŸ”’ Security Configuration

### SSL/TLS
âœ… HTTPS enforced  
âœ… Let's Encrypt certificates  
âœ… TLSv1.2 + TLSv1.3  
âœ… Strong ciphers  
âœ… HSTS enabled  

### Security Headers
âœ… X-Frame-Options  
âœ… X-Content-Type-Options  
âœ… X-XSS-Protection  
âœ… Referrer-Policy  
âœ… HSTS (1 year)  

### Rate Limiting
âœ… API: 10 req/sec  
âœ… Auth: 5 req/min  
âœ… Burst allowed  

### Firewall
âœ… UFW configured  
âœ… SSH: Port 22  
âœ… HTTP: Port 80  
âœ… HTTPS: Port 443
